author.bio: Academic technologist and pedagogic outfitter. WordPressing since 2010. Themes, plugins, security, tweaks

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable WordPress Plugins Report for the week of July 19, 2019
wordpressPost.excerpt: 26 issues this week, with 6 so far unfixed - though Advanced CF7 DB (Advanced Contact form 7 DB) seems to be being worked on. All-in-one migration has multiple issues...
wordpressPost.content:
26 issues this week, with 6 so far unfixed – though Advanced CF7 DB (Advanced Contact form 7 DB) seems to be being worked on. All-in-one migration has multiple issues with one remaining unresolved.
